Line47.6D03F: Strange. I wrote to the Orbei Monastery the day I arrived. The Abbot should have replied by now...
Line53.BAE4: Teckrin spoke of a rumor. A pale man, seen near the canyons.
Line55.6D03F: The canyons? Why didn't you say so? We go at once!
Line57.6D03F: (groan) But we can't leave Orbei unchecked...
Line59.6D03F: Sod it, I'm off to the canyons. You can meet me there or go to the monastery.
Line61.6D03F: You seem reliable, thus far. Do not prove me wrong.
VoiceDir61.6D03F: Firm. Warning. Fearing repeat of past betrayal.
